holidays.title: Grandparents Day

holidays.description: Day of the Homeland is celebrated annually in the Federal Republic of Germany.

holidays.description: Pet owners across the country remember their beloved pets who have passed on.

holidays.title: St. George's Caye Day

holidays.description: Do not forget your bag of ideas on Swap Ideas Day. It will be fun!

holidays.description: Want to say “thank you” through a gesture rather than words? Give top-ups to struggling friends!

holidays.description: White Balloon Day encourages the collective effort of the community to make surroundings safe for children.
